description: Submission of details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 12 (Transport - Travel Plan) in respect of Plot 12 Reserved Matters Application approval (LPA reference: 17/6662/RMA dated 28 February 2018 (as amended) by 20/0362/NMA dated 7 February 2020, 20/1174/NMA dated 4 September 2020, 20/5694/NMA dated 1 April 2021, 21/5981/NMA dated 10 August 2022, 23/2212/NMA dated 4 August 2023 and 23/5028/NMA dated 19 January 2024) falling within Phase 1B (South) sub-phase of the Section 73 outline planning permission for the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme reference F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014. This discharge relates to Plot 12(N) only.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area,North West London
